summary: This module defines Django management commands that let administrators interact with the two‑factor authentication system from the command line. It includes commands to disable all OTP devices for specified users and to display the OTP configuration and activation status for given usernames.
business_intent: Provide command‑line tools for system administrators to control and audit two‑factor authentication settings, enabling bulk disabling of OTP devices and quick status checks of users' two‑factor enrollment.
